attributes.action: To end legal aid payments to solicitors claiming damages against HM forces.
attributes.background: Personal injury lawyers are scouring Iraq for customers to sue the government using public funds also the MOD are paying agents in Iraq to find people to complain.

rejection.details: Elgibility for legal aid applies to the client in a case, not to their lawyer. It is therefore not clear from your petition what changes you would like to see to eligibility rules for legal aid.
